strings.Value: "Oh Great Groetus, don't abandon me, your miserable servant…"
"Oh Harbinger of Last Days, heed my prayer…"
"What a lovely paradox: a deity whose only ambition is the end of all existence, nevertheless grants his servant the power to create!"
"Harrim's prayers give me the creeps. The way they sound makes my skin crawl! Brrrrr!"
"I felt a cold chill. I wonder at the vast difference between our two deities and their faiths.."
"I couldn't say what makes me more weary, his preaching or his prayers."
"Don't despair. Your friends are with you. We won't leave you in trouble."
